meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of a basidium
meanings.sent1: The basidial structure of the mushroom helps in spore production.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the basidial features of different fungi species.
meanings.sent3: The basidial shape of the mushroom made it look like a tiny umbrella.
meanings.sent4: Her basidial knowledge bloomed like a beautiful flower in the field of mycology.
meanings.sent5: The basidial color of the fungi was a vibrant purple, standing out in the forest.
